answers.answer: See the note at the top of the forum...a diabetes tracker and an exercise tracker are coming.You can already track your calories in the Weight tracker.

The exercise tracker is now available. To add it, go to My MedHelp, look for your trackers shortcut panel, and click Add a Tracker. The new exercise tracker will be listed as an option. Thanks for the suggestion!-MedHelp

Hi,We just released a new Diabetes tracker today. You can get it in the Diabetes community at:http://www.medhelp.org/forums/show/46. We're going to be adding to this over the next few weeks, so please let us know your feedback. Thanks!MedHelp

question: Currently I have to divide my trackers between your site and another site.  If you would add a blood glucose tracker, I could consolidate all my primary trackers here.Also a calorie tracker by food and an exercise tracker that also shows calories burned would be helpful.
title: Blood Glucose Tracker
